solution_line_template: In total Thomas would train on {days_in_month} + {additional_days} = <<{days_in_month}+{additional_days}={total_days}>>{total_days} days.

Thomas trained {hours_per_day} hours every day, which would bring us to {total_days} * {hours_per_day} = <<{total_days}*{hours_per_day}={total_training_hours}>>{total_training_hours} hours of training in total.
